page_content:
Capgemini UK plc

Architecture Health Check - IS

Capgemini’s offering is consulting services to provide both assurance and diagnostic of an organisation’s IT architecture, capability to support Cloud services and its practice and delivery. Our approach is focussed on business objectives and independent. It consists of time-boxed phases that identify and diagnose issues.

Features

  • Can cover: Strategic Alignment, Business Engagement, Skills, Capabilities, Governance.
  • Can provide engagement approach that reviews depth/breadth of capability.
  • Can provide an engagement approach that integrates cloud services.
  • Can provide engagement approach that undertakes maturity/effectiveness assessments.
  • Can provide engagement approach for alignment with business strategy.
  • Carry out assessment of the governance around architecture delivery.
  • Can help customers to develop: fixes, transformation roadmap, plan.
  • Can help customers resolve issues that prevent business outcomes.

Benefits

  • Can provide independent assessment of architecture capability, practice delivery.
  • Can help address the challenges and opportunities of cloud services.
  • Can help evaluate maturity, compliance with industry good practice.
  • Can help align architecture practice with standards e.g. TOGAF.
  • Can help customers identify and diagnoses issues.
  • Can help customers fix and strengthen weak architecture areas.
  • Can help customers to establish more effective architecture delivery.
  • Can help customers reduces risk of failing to deliver.
  • Leverage one of UK’s largest and best-established Architecture Practices.
  • Consider different influences: business, enterprise, solution, and technical.

Pricing

£397.0 per person

  • Excluding VAT
  • Minimum contract period: Day
